tool_description: Classifies Y-chromosome and mitochondrial DNA haplogroups based on specific genetic markers to trace paternal and maternal lineages.

marker_type.description: Type of markers to analyze: y_chromosome, mitochondrial, or both

classification_depth.description: Classification depth: basic, standard, detailed, comprehensive

reference_tree.description: Reference phylogenetic tree: isogg, yfull, phylotree

error_messages: Invalid marker type: Use one of [y_chromosome, mitochondrial, both].
Invalid classification depth: Use one of [basic, standard, detailed, comprehensive].
Invalid reference tree: Use one of [isogg, yfull, phylotree].
Insufficient markers: minimum_markers must be between 10 and 500.
No suitable markers found: DNA data lacks required Y or mtDNA markers.
usage: Specify marker_type based on available data. Use higher classification_depth for more detailed haplogroup assignments.
